scripts.new_prerelease: npm version --no-git-tag-version prerelease && cd projects && cd speechrecorderng && npm version --no-git-tag-version prerelease && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.new_prerelease_build_and_pack_module: npm run new_prerelease && npm run build_and_pack_module
scripts.new_patchrelease: npm version --no-git-tag-version patch && cd projects && cd speechrecorderng && npm version --no-git-tag-version patch && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.new_patchrelease_build_and_pack_module: npm run new_patchrelease && npm run build_and_pack_module
scripts.build_module: npm run apply_module_version && ng build speechrecorderng --configuration production
scripts.pack_module: cd dist && cd speechrecorderng && npm pack && mv speechrecorderng-*.tgz ../
scripts.pack_pi_module: cd dist && cd speechrecorderng && npm pack && cd ../../ && node bin/mv_tgz_pkgs.js
scripts.build_and_pack_module: npm run build_module && npm run pack_pi_module
scripts.publish_module: cd dist && cd speechrecorderng && npm publish
